name: cities_in_a_state
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool referential_db.
Tool description: Get global countries, states, and cities data. Filter and display results in multiple languages.
API description: Fetches the list of cities in a given state.

statecode.description: The code of the state for which the cities are to be fetched.

countrycode.description: The code of the country where the state is located.
